body:
Hi,


> I have been using trad with my undergraduate students for a number of years.
> Last used with the KNOPPIX_V5.1.1CD-2007-01-04-EN.iso (debian) and built
> with the makeall script. Worked fine no issues.


should be easy to provide a Debian live CD with radiance. I'll look into
that once radiance is migrated to testing, and all bugs/wishes/... are
fixed.


Cheers,


Bernd




Bernd Zeimetz
<bernd at bzed.de>                         <http://bzed.de/>
